alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:37PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tehama and southwestern Shasta Counties through 730 PM PDT... At 636 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Platina, or 9 miles southeast of Yolla Bolly District Rs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding, Igo, Ono, Saddle Camp, Beegum, Rosewood, Platina and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley
